ComicInfo.Summary:
The Dream Trap Part One: Silver Surfer battles Audit in space. The Warheads confront an early incarnation of Wolverine shortly after his days with Weapon X.
Liger Get Your Gun!: Liger and company steal his super sophisticated gun Clementine.
Immortal Remains: The Warheads battle an ancient power awakened by Bysshe.

ComicInfo.Title: The Dream Trap Part One; Liger Get Your Gun!; Immortal Remains
